\documentclass[english]{article}
\usepackage[T1]{fontenc}
\usepackage[latin9]{inputenc}

\usepackage{babel}

\begin{document}
\begin{center}
\textsf{\textbf{\Large Ls}}
\par\end{center}{\Large \par}

\textsf{\textbf{Description:}}

List information about the FILE.

\textsf{\textbf{Arguments:}}

-l, use a long listing format 

-s, print the size of each file, in blocks 

-a, do not ignore entries starting with .

-F, append indicator (one of {*}/=>@|) to entries

\textsf{\textbf{Usage:}}

ls {[}OPTION] FILE

\textsf{\textbf{Author:}}

Moraru Ionut

\textsf{\textbf{Version:}}

1.0.8
\end{document}
